description:
SUPER FUN and 100% FREE! DOWNLOAD NOW!
Check out the reviews from iOS - you're going to love Bubble Jewels!
••••• "I love this game - it's so easy to play and so easy to learn!" --HoneyX3
••••• "Very entertaining and makes you concentrate! Very good for the brain!" --BethanyBrian
••••• "A great bubble game and addictive" --Drangonfly9259


EASY TO LEARN AND PLAY!

• Just swipe on the remote and click to launch a bubble exactly where you want it to go!

• Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color and they drop!

• Your goal is to clear all the bubbles from the board… You can do it!


RELAX WHILE YOU SHARPEN YOUR MIND!

• No timers, so take your time and relax

• Beautiful graphics and animation

• Relaxing sound effects

• Listen to your own music while playing


GOOD TIMES

• Simple and elegant gameplay

• Endless variety, never the same game twice

• NEW - Challenge Mode for players who want a seriously tricky game! (If you are currently in a game and want to switch to Challenge Mode, click the "restart" curved arrow button to restart your game and choose Challenge Mode)

• Compare your scores with the world using Game Center

• Your progress is automatically saved, all the time!


Get Bubble Jewels now, and start the fun!
